data.text: @brucemid1 @BasementEast @beck I agree. I was on there right at noon. Even had tickets in the cart… gone..

@BasementEast @beck I knew getting tickets would be a long shot, but it's very disappointing to see them already listed on secondary sites for hundreds of dollars. Next time please take steps to reduce scalping, such as making the tickets will-call only
@BasementEast @beck Y’all should delete this tweet. You botched this one.
@BasementEast Same here. Refreshed every 10 seconds until noon, then waiting in line and then oops, sold out. Amazingly tix are already available at vivid seats for $215.
@bhaktab @BasementEast @beck Yeah I had two and checking out then it rerouted me to the waiting line.
@ajs3677 @BasementEast @beck Less than that.  I was in at 12 pm exactly and they didn't have any available.  I'm assuming bots bought them all in 2 seconds.
